questions.question_text: How are user permissions set in Falcon?

choices.A: Permissions are assigned to a User Group and then users are assigned to that group, thereby inheriting those permissions
choices.C: An administrator selects individual granular permissions from the Falcon Permissions List during user creation
choices.D: Permissions are token-based. Users request access to a defined set of permissions and an administrator adds their token to the set of permissions
choices.B: Pre-defined permissions are assigned to sets called roles. Users can be assigned multiple roles based on job function and they assume a cumulative set of permissions based on those assignments

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct, checked in the docs

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
B is the way that permissions are set. Did it so many time from the console.

Selected Answer: B
B is the correct answer.

choices.C: From a command line, run the sc query csagent -version command
choices.D: Use the Investigate > Host Search to filter to the specific endpoint
choices.A: Use the Sensor Report to filter to the specific endpoint
choices.B: Use Host Management to select the desired endpoint. The agent version will be listed in the columns and details

choices.D: Register the Falcon Sensor via the registration package, then install the Falcon package
choices.A: Install the Falcon package, then register the Falcon Sensor via the registration package
choices.C: Register the Falcon Sensor via command line, then install the Falcon package
choices.B: Install the Falcon package, then register the Falcon Sensor via command line

questions.question_text: You are beginning the rollout of the Falcon Sensor for the first time side-by-side with your existing security solution. You need to configure the Machine Learning levels of the Prevention Policy so it does not interfere with existing solutions during the testing phase. What settings do you choose?

choices.A:
• Detection slider: Extra Aggressive
• Prevention slider: Cautious
choices.D:
• Detection slider: Disabled
• Prevention slider: Disabled
choices.C:
• Detection slider: Cautious
• Prevention slider: Cautious
choices.B:
• Detection slider: Moderate
• Prevention slider: Disabled
